level.text: No person shall act as an alarm agent within the boundaries of the District of Columbia without first obtaining from the Director an alarm agent’s license, as required by ยง6 of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง7-2804 (2001)) and this chapter.
No alarm dealer shall permit a person to perform the services of an alarm agent on behalf of the dealer’s business without ensuring that the person has valid agent’s license to perform the work.
